related_questions.question: Do I need a travel tripod?
related_questions.snippet: If you have a very heavy camera setup, then you will need a much sturdier tripod than if you have a smaller DSLR, mirrorless, or compact camera. The majority of travelers are not traveling with heavy cameras, so the majority of travel tripods should be sturdy enough for most.May 22, 2019
